Description.Name: Thunder-Inferno LRM Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Thunder-Inferno missiles act like artillery, dispersing incendiary munitions over a wide area.

Thunder-Augmented LRM Ammo Bins contain half as many shots per ton as standard LRM ammunition bins. This half-capacity bin contains 30 rounds.
